name: Glove
description: A fun project for Software Engineering course at TUL. Built in React Native (frontend) and Django (backend). The challenge of this project was building a three different views. One view was for delivery man, second one was for restaurant owner and the last one was for client. This project was challenging and i learnt a lot of concepts of software engineering.

name: Cinema management application
description: A project for another course at TUL. Purposes of this app are: screening management, ticket and screening room management. Frontend built in React using MaterialUI and backend built using Spring Boot. While i was doing this project, i learn about metrics in software engineering.

name: Currency Viewer
description: One of my side projects. Basically this project collect data from cinkciarz.pl and display it in little window. This project is built in python. That was a project that i learn how to use BeautifulSoup and requests library. The GUI was built in Tkinter.

name: Proper Dark Theme
description: One of my side projects. When I was searching for theme for vs code, I couldn't find one that suits me. So I decieded to create one. This project is open-source. On repo you can find the marketplace link, if want to try it out.

name: Dice Roller
description: My first attempt at an Android application. In this project, I focused on learning Kotlin. This app is simple we roll the dice. Simple but fun to use and could act like a clicker!
